=, She, said, it, is, dandruff, which, is, causing, hair, fall
=, Now, I, am, taking, the, medicines, and, using, the, shampoo, given, by, her, and, things, are, looking, good
=, Now, my, question, is, that, I, lose, hair, during, shower, but, otherwise, it, is, none
=, Like, I, am, sitting, and, doing, my, work, or, when, I, comb, my, hair, there, is, no, hair, fall
=, it, is, only, during, shower
=, One, more, point, hair, that, fall, are, without, roots, or, bulbs, as, many, say, it

=, Originally, posted, by, catredtip, pretty
=, how, do, you, do, your, bantu, knots
=, Do, you, have, a, tutorial
=, In, the, pictures, in, this, thread, my, hair, is, flatironed
=, The, results, of, the, Bantu, KNots, come, out, differently, depending, on, the, texture, of, my, hair
=, When, my, hair, is, not, flat, ironed, the, knot, out, looks, like, this, No, matter, the, texture, of, my, hair, the, process, is, the, same
=, 
=, I, randomly, take, sections, of, hair, I, do, not, part, because, I, do, not, want, harsh, lines
=, The, more, hair, you, take, the, more, loose, the, curl, will, be, so, if, you, want, tight, curls, use, small, sections, of, hair
=, 
=, I, apply, a, moisturizer, I, use, olive, oil, hair, lotion, from, the, roots, to, then, ends, and, then, I, apply, an, oil, EVOO, from, roots, to, ends, I, put, the, most, product, on, my, ends
=, 
=, Then, I, two, strand, twist, the, hair, from, there, I, do, the, bantu, knot, wrap, the, hair, around, itself, you, have, to, for, the, knot, in, the, same, direction, you, did, the, two, strand, twist, or, else, it, will, not, work
=, 
=, I, secure, the, knots, with, a, rubberband, that, I, SATURATE, in, oil, so, that, when, I, take, it, out, it, does, not, pull, on, my, hair, if, the, rubberband, has, enough, oil, on, it, it, will, slide, right, off, but, I, prefer, to, pop, them
=, From, all, of, that, I, get, this, I, would, suggest, leaving, them, in, for, several, hours, so, they, can, set
=, I, usually, sleep, with, a, satin, bonnet, and, take, them, out, in, the, morning
=, When, you, take, them, out, remove, the, rubberband, and, unwrap, the, knot
=, It, should, look, like, this, From, there, I, separate, the, twist, into, the, the, two, strands, so, that, there, are, two, coils
=, Then, I, separate, each, coil, into, two, parts, to, make, it, look, more, full
=, You, may, want, to, use, a, little, oil, when, taking, down, the, knots, so, that, it, does, not, get, frizzy, from, you, touching, it
=, When, it, is, all, out, I, spray, a, little, garnie, Fructis, holding, spray
=, If, you, sleep, with, a, satin, bonnet, it, should, last, a, few, days
=, Sorry, it, is, so, long, I, hope, I, described, well, enough

=, Then, I, rebraid

=,

=, It, held, up, without, breaking
=, But, I, would, not, say, it, is, invincible
-, I, get, splits, because, my, hair, is, coarse, AND, curly, and, tends, to, get, fairy, knots
-, I, get, knots, sometimes, and, because, my, hair, is, strong, knots, are, hard, to, remove
-, Those, sometimes, are, worse, than, splits
+, But, generally, it, is, really, strong, My, hair, can, withstand, high, levels, of, heat, with, very, little, to, no, damage
=, it, is, also, coarse, and, dry, so, I, do, regular, oilings, on, my, hair, while, it, is, wet

=, And, because, my, hair, is, curly, too, occasionally, I, will, use, a, little, bit, of, vegetable, shortening, not, butter, flavored, lol, unscented, safflower, and, cottonseed, oil, I, am, not, that, crazy, on, my, length, to, smooth, hair, into, buns, and, other, styles, kind, of, like, an, inexpensive, pomade
=, For, some, reason, my, coarse, hair, loves, to, be, oiled
=, I, wonder, if, other, coarsies, are, like, that, But, I, have, had, the, stickiness, before
=, I, fixed, that, with, using, a, bit, less, oil, on, wet, hair, then, brushing, it, through, when, dry, to, distribute
=, It, got, rid, of, the, stuck, together, feel, that, my, hair, usually, gets
=, If, I, have, used, too, much, oil, I, will, just, rinse, with, warm, water, and, my, hair, still, feels, moisturized, but, not, sticky

=, TITLETITLE, My, Hair, Routine, Apple, Cider, Vinegar, and, Herbal, Essences
=, I, have, reading, so, much, on, CurlyNikki
=, com, about, different, hair, products, for, women, with, natural, curly, hair
=, I, found, out, that, a, lot, of, the, products, out, there, contain, very, harsh, chemicals, that, break, down, the, hair, shaft, and, can, lead, to, pretty, serious, damage
-, I, have, been, using, a, Pantene, shampoo, and, conditioner, and, discovered, that, it, contains, some, of, these, harmful, agents
-, No, wonder, my, hair, has, been, so, unmanageable, and, rough
=, I, have, heard, of, women, rinsing, their, hair, with, apple, cider, vinegar, but, never, thought, it, would, be, something, I, would, try
=, However, upon, reading, lots, of, reviews, and, watching, youtube, videos, about, it, I, found, that, it, actually, rejuvenates, the, hair, by, removing, all, the, gunk, on, the, hair, and, scalp, closing, the, hair, shaft, to, lock, in, moister, easily, detangling, the, hair, and, creating, a, nice, sheen
=, The, only, side, effect, I, have, read, so, far, is, that, if, you, use, too, much, and, too, often, depending, on, your, hair, your, hair, will, become, very, dry
=, So, I, thought, I, give, it, a, go
=, But, FIRST, I, wanted, to, find, a, good, conditioner, to, use, after, I, rinse, my, hair, with, the, apple, cider, vinegar, ACV
=, Once, again, through, research, I, saw, that, a, lot, of, women, with, naturally, curly, hair, use, Herbal, Essences, Totally, Twisted, Conditioner
=, I, mean, A, LOT, of, them, use, this
=, Therefore, it, must, be, good, for, something, especially, since, it, is, specially, formulated, for, curly, hair, textures
=, So, I, went, to, CVS, today, to, pick, up, a, bottle, of, Herbal, Essences, Totally, Twisted, Conditioner, HE, TT, Herbal, Essence, Hydralicious, Conditioner, HE, H, and, Garnier, Fructis, Triple, Nutrition, Conditioner, for, each, sale, price
=, I, wanted, to, test, out, several, products, to, see, which, one, will, work, better, and, since, they, were, on, sale, regular, price, is, around
=, So, I, mixed, up, one, tablespoon, of, ACV, with, a, cup, ounces, of, filtered, water, in, a, bottle
=, Before, I, got, into, the, shower, I, was, sporting, a, flat, twist, out, that, was, about, two, days, old, I, believe, lol
=, 
=, I, did, not, detangle, my, hair, or, anything, before, I, got, into, the, shower
=, Once, I, got, in, I, wet, my, hair, and, applied, the, ACV, rinse, to, my, scalp, while, letting, any, extra, drip, toward, the, ends, of, my, hair
+, OMG, My, hair, transformed, IMMEDIATELY
+, Instantly, my, hair, texture, started, to, feel, smoother, as, a, result, of, the, ACV, chalking, away, that, gunk, of, shea, butter, olive, oil, and, gel, from, my, hair
+, My, hair, began, to, feel, softer, as, I, began, combing, my, hair, with, a, wide, tooth, comb
+, And, tangles, What, tangles, That, comb, ran, so, easily, through, my, hair, better, than, any, conditioner, I, have, used, I, started, combing, at, my, ends, of, course, and, worked, my, way, to, the, top
=, The, smell, was, hardly, an, issue
=, I, let, the, vinegar, sit, in, my, hair, for, a, few, more, minutes, and, then, rinsed, it, out, under, warm, water
=, I, then, proceeded, to, put, a, wallop, of, the, HE, Totally, Twisted, Conditioner, in, my, hair, focusing, on, the, ends
=, I, finger, combed, the, conditioner, throughout, my, hair, and, then, rinsed, the, conditioner, out, of, my, hair, after, a, few, minutes, while, I, washed, up, as, the, shower, water, was, starting, to, get, cold
=, After, I, was, done, I, shook, my, hair, lightly, and, noticed, some, curl, definition, in, my, hair
=, Next, time, I, will, take, a, picture, of, the, process
=, I, was, rushing, so, my, daughter, can, get, into, the, bathroom, for, her, routine, bath
+, Anyway, I, felt, my, hair, and, it, was, OH, SO, SOFT
=, It, was, crazy
+, I, asked, my, boyfriend, to, feel, my, hair, and, he, said, it, felt, stronger
=, I, was, like, ok, as, if, he, has, enough, experience, with, my, hair, to, know, when, it, feels, weak, or, strong
=, But, then, maybe, he, just, knows
=, I, do, not, know
+, But, it, is, amazing, how, something, so, simple, and, natural, as, ACV, can, do, wonders, to, the, hair
+, I, am, HOOKED
+, I, am, going, to, add, this, ACV, rinse, to, my, hair, routine, unless, I, found, something, bad, about, it, otherwise
=, The, HE, TT, is, a, keeper, also
=, I, liked, how, it, was, not, too, thick, or, too, thin, and, it, has, a, nice, smell, to, it
=, I, am, not, sure, how, often, I, will, do, the, rinse
=, It, depends, on, how, long, I, decide, to, go, between, styles
=, I, flat, twisted, my, hair, into, nine, sections, and, curled, the, ends, with, flexirods
=, On, each, section, I, added, my, shea, butter, oil, mix, to, seal, the, ends, mainly, and, some, lock, and, twist, gel
=, I, need, to, invest, in, a, spray, bottle, so, I, can, keep, my, hair, moist, while, I, am, working, on, a, section, of, hair, at, a, time
=, I, tied, down, my, hair, with, a, scarf, before, I, worked, out, and, hopefully, it, will, be, dried, in, the, morning
=, I, am, getting, so, much, better, with, my, flat, twist
=, I, am, glad, because, I, need, to, get, the, technique, down, before, my, daughter, grows, a, head, full, of, hair
=, I, will, post, a, picture, of, the, hair, results

=, If, you, have, not, then, you, might, want, to, know, how, to, do, this, now
=, It, is, not, very, hard, but, you, need, to, follow, the, instructions, carefully
=, Conversion, Instructions, First, you, will, need, a, Video, Card, set, up, in, your, PC
=, It, is, a, piece, of, hardware, that, generates, and, outputs, images
=, It, can, be, used, for, Mpeg, decoding, TV, tuner, adaptation, video, capture, for, connecting, joysticks, and, for, connecting, multiple, monitors
=, You, can, usually, get, a, video, card, for, around
=, It, will, be, a, MB, card, that, is, enough, for, most, functions
=, Your, PC, is, likely, to, have, an, S, Video, port
=, You, will, need, to, plug, an, S, Video, cable, to, the, S, Video, out, port
=, Then, connect, it, to, your, TV, in, the, S, Video, In, port
=, To, carry, the, sound, signals, you, need, an, RCA, cable
=, Hook, up, the, RCA, cable, red, and, black, into, the, corresponding, ports, on, the, TV
=, Hook, up, the, other, end, of, the, RCA, cable, into, your, laptop, or, PC
=, You, can, also, use, PC, speakers
=, Now, we, need, to, adapt, the, video, card, settings, in, the, PC
=, 
=, Right, Click, on, the, PC, desktop
=, Click, Properties

=, Now, Click, Advanced, You, will, get, a, window, that, says, Graphic, Card, settings
=, Choose, the, Display, Settings, tab
=, Then, choose, the, Single, display, option
=, Then, your, screen, may, become, blank, and, you, will, likely, see, the, screensaver
=, Now, select, the, Clone, option, for, the, TV
=, This, will, send, the, PC, signal, through, the, S, Video, cable, to, the, TV
=, You, need, to, press, the, TV, Video, or, AV, or, some, similar, button, on, your, TV, remote

=, TITLETITLE, The, truth, about, hair, care, products
=, let, us, talk, about, HAIR, CARE, GIRLS, HAIR, is, a, LIFELESS, filamen
-, What, I, mean, is, whatever, is, on, the, surface, is, dead, and, it, is, impossible, to, do, anything, about, it
=, Like, nails, for, example, or, teeth, if, broken, wait, for, a, new, one, to, grow, nail, or, seal, it, up
*, Hair, can, look, better, or, worse, depending, on, the, products, you, use
=, If, the, product, has, silicone, in, it, that, is, when, we, get, our, hair, to, shine
=, because, the, silicone, wraps, the, surface, of, the, hair, with, a, thin, layer, making, Cuticular, scales, stick, together, and, us, happy, If, we, do, not, use, a, conditioner, or, we, use, a, shampoo, that, leaves, a, residue, on, hair, hair, look, dull, stick, to, each, other, and, impossible, to, manage
=, What, comes, to, hair, coloring, the, chemicals, destroy, the, hair, pigment, place, the, dying, pigment, that, 's, it
=, If, a, product, is, strong, pigments, can, stay, in, the, hair, up, to, months
=, Which, product, should, we, choose, for, hair, coloring
=, the, one, that, will, not, destroy, our, hair
=, None, it, just, does, not, exist, and, will, never, work
=, So, the, answer, is, simple, all, hair, dying, products, work, the, same, way, every, single, one, of, them, except, natural, henna, is, harmful, to, hair
=, How, to, restore, conditioners
+, If, you, hold, them, longer, they, work, as, a, mask
=, You, can, even, use, a, leave, on, conditioner, they, hold, a, silicone, film, much, longer, but, it, feel, s, quite, greasy, so, it, is, the, matter, of, preference
=, ATTENTION, THE, IMPORTANT, MESSAGE
=, Non, shampoo, improves, the, condition, of, our, hair, only, conditioner, does
=, The, purpose, of, any, shampoo, is, to, dissolve, oils, and, dirt, to, wash, them, off, and, NOT, to, LEAVE, any, minerals, ON, HAIR
=, So, to, waste, your, money, on, shampoos, that, are, more, expensive, than, is, just, lame, and, unnecessary
=, To, FEEL, the, DIFFERENCE, it, is, necessary, NOT, to, SAVE, your, money, ON, a, good, decent, conditioner
=, I, recommend, Garnier

=, TITLETITLE, Hair, Products, For, Curls
-, Most, people, with, curly, hair, cannot, go, product, free
=, Of, course, you, need, to, shampoo, and, condition, but, there, is, also, a, need, for, styling, products
*, The, products, that, work, for, you, might, not, work, for, the, next, person, even, if, you, both, have, curly, hair, because, everyone, 's, curly, hair, is, different
=, Some, people, have, large, curls, others, have, tight, spirals
=, Some, people, have, dry, hair, others, have, very, dry, hair
=, The, best, way, to, know, which, products, will, work, for, you, is, to, experiment
-, If, you, try, a, product, and, your, hair, turns, out, bad, try, something, else
=, First, you, need, a, good, shampoo
*, Shampoo, can, really, add, to, the, dryness, of, your, hair, so, you, must, make, sure, you, get, the, right, one
-, Also, because, it, can, be, so, drying, you, should, really, cut, back, on, your, shampoos
-, Do, not, shampoo, every, time, you, wash
+, Shampoo, every, other, time, or, once, or, twice, a, week
-, Go, longer, if, you, can
-, On, the, days, you, do, not, shampoo, just, put, a, little, bit, of, conditioner, on, your, scalp, and, scrub, with, your, fingers, to, loosen, the, dirt
=, Get, a, shampoo, designed, for, curly, hair, or, a, moisturizing, shampoo
=, Next, you, will, need, to, condition, your, hair
=, Conditioners, like, vo, and, suave, are, too, thin, and, not, strong, enough, for, curly, hair
=, Try, to, go, for, thicker, conditioners, like, Dove, or, garnier, fructis
=, Your, hair, needs, something, that, it, can, soak, up
=, Leave, it, on, for, at, least, a, minute, or, longer, for, extra, moisturizing
-, Always, condition, your, hair, every, time, you, wash, it
=, Concentrate, more, conditioner, on, the, ends, to, get, them, extra, moisturized, because, the, ends, are, your, oldest, hair, and, usually, the, driest
=, Conditioning, is, very, important, for, curly, dry, hair
=, Make, sure, you, do, not, skip, it
=, It, is, likely, that, the, daily, conditioning, you, do, will, not, be, enough, so, you, should, supplement, it, with, a, deep, condition, once, a, month, or, every, couple, of, weeks
=, Find, something, that, is, specially, designed, as, a, deep, conditioning, treatment, that, you, leave, on, longer
=, You, could, also, use, a, hot, oil, treatment, every, once, and, a, while, as, well
=, Once, you, are, clean, and, conditioned, you, will, be, styling
-, Styling, products, are, important, to, get, the, right, curls
=, If, you, skip, the, styling, products, your, hair, may, frizz, up, and, just, get, unruly
+, There, are, several, different, types, of, styling, products, you, can, use
+, Whichever, you, choose, I, recommend, always, starting, with, a, leave, in, conditioner, first
+, This, ensures, that, you, will, not, lose, moisture, throughout, the, day
*, Next, you, will, need, to, use, a, styling, product, that, holds, your, curls, and, reduces, frizz
+, A, serum, is, a, possibility, to, help, reduce, frizz, but, on, top, of, that, I, recommend, either, a, gel, or, mousse
+, Both, of, these, provide, much, needed, hold, for, frizzy, hair
+, Once, you, have, applied, all, your, products, you, are, ready, to, let, your, hair, dry, and, enjoy, your, amazing, curls

-, Tried, butters, hated, them
+, Tried, oils, hated, them

=, TITLETITLE, Full, Lace, lace, front, wigs, Full, Lace, Tips, and, Tricks
+, a, Tips, and, Tricks, about, Liquid, Bonding, Adhesives, Below, a, list, of, helpful, tips, to, help, you, achieve, the, strongest, and, most, secure, bond, possible
=, When, applying, the, liquid, adhesive, only, use, thin, even, coats
=, If, you, are, using, a, brush, use, a, pare, not, movement, with, your, hand, in, both, directions, horizontal, and, vertical
+, If, more, adhesive, is, desired, use, thin, multiple, coats, but, make, sure, the, previous, coat, is, dry, before, applying, the, next, coat
=, Never, try, to, apply, liquid, bond, directly, to, a, lace, system
=, Instead, apply, it, on, your, scalp, and, place, the, unit, on, your, head
=, Always, clean, and, prepare, your, scalp, properly, with, skin, shield, before, attaching, your, full, lace, lace, front, wig
+, Skin, shield, is, a, product, that, provides, a, protective, barrier, against, dermal, irritation, while, enhancing, the, effectiveness, of, skin, safe, liquid, or, tape, adhesives
=, After, showering, or, working, out, the, bond, of, your, full, lace, lace, front, wig, will, seem, like, it, is, weakening, which, is, expected, then, even, if, your, hair, system, is, still, attached, securely, the, bond, will, soften, a, bit, due, to, extra, heat, and, moisture, do, not, touch, the, unit, then, because, as, your, body, cools, the, bond, will, harden, again
-, Airborne, dust, make, up, will, attach, itself, to, the, adhesive, in, the, front, and, side, edges, of, lace, units, and, may, become, visible, over, time
=, Immediately, after, a, shower, is, the, easiest, time, to, clean, this, area, because, the, hairpiece, adhesive, is, pliable
=, Spray, a, liberal, amount, of, Adjust, a, Bond, on, the, tip, of, a, double, folded, tissue
=, Hold, your, hair, back, with, one, hand, and, wipe, the, edge, of, the, lace, using, the, saturated, tissue, with, the, other, hand
=, This, trick, will, help, keep, your, lace, front, and, side, edges, invisible, at, all, times
=, b, Tips, and, Tricks, to, avoid, shedding, Below, a, list, of, helpful, tips, to, avoid, excessive, shedding
=, Some, light, shedding, is, normal, however, your, full, lace, lace, front, wig, should, not, shed, anymore, then, our, own, hair, would
=, DO, NOT, put, any, hair, products, that, contain, a, high, percentage, of, alcohol, like, some, hair, spray, spritz, etc
=, directly, into, the, hair, of, your, full, lace, lace, front, wig
-, These, products, will, damage, the, hair, and, cause, excessive, shedding
=, When, going, to, sleep, wearing, your, full, lace, lace, front, wig, always, braid, up, the, hair, or, at, least, put, it, in, a, pony, tail, so, it, will, not, tangle, up, while, you, sleep
=, Best, is, for, you, to, wrap, a, scarf, around, your, head, or, to, wear, a, hair, bonnet, while, you, are, asleep, see, below, section, Tips, and, Tricks, to, avoid, damages, while, sleeping
=, This, will, prevent, the, hair, of, your, full, lace, lace, front, wig, from, breakage, and, shedding
=, When, swimming, wearing, your, full, lace, lace, front, wig, keep, in, mind, that, chlorine, and, salt, water, can, damage, the, hair, of, the, unit, therefore, wear, a, swim, cap, or, wash, your, full, lace, lace, front, wig, after, each, swim, session
-, NEVER, let, chlorine, and, salt, water, stay, in, the, hair, of, your, full, lace, lace, front, wig, as, it, will, damage, the, hair, of, your, unit, irreversibly
=, Reseal, the, knots, located, on, the, inside, of, your, full, lace, lace, front, wig, cap, after, each, and, every, wash, with, some, knot, sealer
+, This, will, strengthen, the, knots, on, each, hair, strand, and, protect, your, full, lace, lace, front, wig, from, excessive, shedding
+, c, Tips, and, Tricks, for, Curly, Deep, Wave, and, Wavy, Styles, Below, a, moisturizer, tip, for, Full, lace, full, lace, lace, front, wigs, with, a, Curly, Deep, Wave, Wavy, Style
+, Wash, and, rinse, your, full, lace, lace, front, wig, gently, but, thoroughly, then, spray, until, saturation, with, a, Dove, Moisturizing, Conditioner, of, Glycerin, and, plain, water, mixture

-, TITLETITLE, Shampoo, Bottle, you, fail
=, For, a, while, now, I, have, been, annoyed
*, I, typically, do, not, have, a, problem, opening, my, shampoo, bottle, but, when, it, runs, out
-, and, I, am, forced, to, embrace, my, feminine, side, and, use, my, wife, 's, shampoo
=, I, get, annoyed
-, The, problem, stems, from, the, Garnier, 's, Fructis, Shampoo, bottle, 's, cap
-, It, is, a, twofold, annoyance
-, It, would, appear, that, the, bottle, is, made, so, that, it, can, stand, on, it, is, head, allowing, you, to, leave, the, bottle, upside, down, to, get, the, last, drop, of, shampoo, out
=, Well, that, would, make, sense, and, it, would, be, a, well, thought, out, feature, to, users
-, However, this, bottle, has, a, silly, spherical, cap, jutting, out, of, the, top, of, it
-, It, is, impossible, to, balance, the, bottle, upside, down, because, of, it
-, Not, only, is, that, cap, spherical, but, it, is, also, smooth
=, There, are, no, grooves, in, it
-, The, bottle, designers, failed, to, think, about, the, environment, that, their, users, consume, the, product
=, The, shower
=, It, is, wet, in, the, shower
=, At, all, times, in, the, shower, it, is, wet
-, And, thus, all, users, hands, are, wet, and, thereby, things, like, shampoo, bottles, are, harder, to, grip, and, harder, to, manipulate
-, This, cap, being, smooth, is, very, difficult, to, open
-, I, have, had, to, jam, my, fingernail, under, the, cap, on, numerous, occasions, to, open, it, and, sometimes, afterward, my, nail, hurts, because, it, is, bent, backwards
-, For, not, accounting, for, the, environment, of, your, users, Shampoo, Bottle, you, fail
=, Next, time, put, some, grooves, in, your, sphere, cap

=,

=, TITLETITLE, Sodium, Laureth, Sulphate, in, a, Shampoo, Yay, or, Nay
=, A, few, days, back, I, received, this, mail, from, a, reader, Are, you, aware, of, any, SLS, Sodium, Lauryl, Sulfate, free, shampoos, or, Bio, shampoos, as, they, are, commonly, called, and, conditioners, available, in, India
=, I, have, been, trying, to, find, one, but, have, so, far, been, unsuccessful
=, I, have, recently, become, a, mother, and, as, with, all, new, mothers, I, have, been, a, victim, of, hair, loss, and, dandruff
=, I, tried, a, few, desi, nuskas, but, they, do, not, seem, to, work, or, either, I, am, trying, for, too, short, a, period
=, I, have, dry, rough, now, damaged, thick, wavy, hair
=, I, am, aware, of, SLS, present, in, shampoos, face, washes, body, washes, detergents, etc
=, Sodium, Lauryl, Sulfate, Sodium, Laureth, Sulfate, SLS, and, Sodium, Laureth, Sulfate, SLES, are, surfactants, and, are, both, expected, to, produce, foam, in, products
=, Since, I, am, not, a, dermatologist, or, a, scientist, I, have, picked, up, extracts, from, the, research, I, did, regarding, the, same
=, Why, is, a, dangerous, chemical, like, sodium, lauryl, sulfate, used, in, our, soaps, and, shampoos
=, The, answer, is, simple, it, is, cheap
=, The, sodium, lauryl, sulfate, found, in, our, soaps, is, exactly, the, same, as, you, would, find, in, a, car, wash, or, even, a, garage, where, it, is, used, to, degrease, car, engines
=, In, the, same, way, as, it, dissolves, the, grease, on, car, engines, sodium, lauryl, sulfate, also, dissolves, the, oils, on, your, skin, which, can, cause, a, drying, effect
=, It, is, also, well, documented, that, it, denatures, skin, proteins, which, causes, not, only, irritation, but, also, allows, environmental, contaminants, easier, access, to, the, lower, sensitive, layers, of, the, skin
=, Perhaps, most, worryingly, SLS, is, also, absorbed, into, the, body, from, skin, application
=, Once, it, has, been, absorbed, one, of, the, main, effects, of, sodium, lauryl, sulfate, is, to, mimic, the, activity, of, the, hormone, Oestrogen
=, This, has, many, health, implications, and, may, be, responsible, for, a, variety, of, health, problems, from, PMS, and, Menopausal, symptoms, to, dropping, male, fertility, and, increasing, female, cancers, such, as, breast, cancer, where, oestrogen, levels, are, known, to, be, involved
=, Source, On, the, other, hand, SLS, has, been, used, in, shampoo, for, over, fifty, years, by, millions, of, people, millions, of, times, repeatedly
=, So, why, is, not, everyone, bald
=, There, is, a, glut, of, possible, reasons
-, Some, people, may, be, more, sensitive, to, SLS, than, others, perhaps, some, sort, of, mild, allergic, reaction
=, It, is, possible, people, with, male, pattern, baldness, may, be, more, susceptible, to, the, alleged, evils, of, SLS
*, Some, people, may, use, less, shampoo, and, so, are, less, exposed, or, maybe, they, rinse, their, hair, more, thoroughly, so, there, is, less, residue
=, Hair, length, could, be, a, factor
+, The, more, hair, you, have, the, more, dilute, the, residue, will, be, on, your, hair, and, scalp, a, possible, reason, why, women, do, not, bald, as, much, as, men
=, Source, Scenario, Imagine, washing, your, hair, with, just, plain, water
+, From, a, chemical, view, point, scrubbing, your, hair, and, using, warm, water, will, help, dislodge, some, oil, but, really, not, that, much, Scenario, Washing, your, hair, with, SLS, containing, shampoo, When, a, surfactant, such, as, SLS, is, used, oil, can, be, dissolved, away, from, the, hair
+, The, hair, is, left, squeaky, clean, and, oil, free
=, This, is, because, SLS, can, form, micelles, which, help, carry, the, oil, away, during, the, rinsing, of, the, shampoo
=, Now, not, everyone, wants, squeaky, clean, hair
+, Curly, hair, does, pretty, well, with, some, oil, on, it
-, However, if, you, are, trying, to, get, rid, of, a, silicone, product, have, too, much, oil, on, your, hair, or, have, used, a, product, that, you, did, not, like, and, your, conditioner, is, not, helping, you, some, SLS, shampoo, may, actually, work, to, give, you, a, clean, slate
=, There, are, surfactants, in, conditioner, for, example, behentrimonium, chloride, but, these, are, not, nearly, as, comparable, to, SLS
=, Source, Sodium, lauryl, sulphate, is, sodium, laureth, sulphate, chemically, combined, with, ethylene, oxide, to, form, larger, molecules
=, Why, on, earth, should, anyone, be, concerned, about, the, size, of, the, molecules
=, Well, one, reason, is, because, small, molecules, such, as, those, of, sodium, laureth, sulphate, can, pass, through, skin, into, the, body, where, they, enter, the, blood, stream, and, build, up, in, the, internal, organs, especially, the, brain, and, kidneys
-, Bearing, in, mind, what, sodium, laureth, sulphate, does, to, the, comparatively, tough, skin, I, hate, to, think, what, it, can, do, to, the, gentle, internal, organs
=, Source, I, personally, went, around, to, check, which, all, shampoos, have, SLS, or, SLES
=, Following, is, the, list

=, TITLETITLE, Review, Cloud, Nine, Straighteners
+, The, Cloud, Nine, brand, was, created, by, the, original, founders, and, inventors, of, the, original, ghd, and, is, fast, becoming, very, popular, in, the, UK
+, The, Cloud, Nine, ethos, is, Less, heat, more, style, The, straighteners, have, the, flexibility, to, create, a, range, of, styles, without, the, need, for, searing, heat
+, The, straighteners, come, in, a, really, chic, black, box, that, is, both, contemporary, and, practical
-, I, almost, did, not, want, to, get, them, out, as, they, looked, so, good, in, there
+, Features, of, the, Cloud, Nine, The, straighteners, have, a, temperature, control, panel, that, allows, you, to, choose, a, low, medium, or, high, heat, setting
+, There, is, also, an, LED, display, that, clearly, shows, what, temperature, it, is, set, at, and, has, buttons, that, you, can, press, to, either, higher, or, lower, the, heat
+, Cloud, Nine, state, that, there, is, a, special, ingredient, in, the, black, ceramic, plates, that, give, hair, an, added, shine, and, sparkle, each, time, it, is, used
=, It, has, a, hibernation, mode, that, kicks, in, when, the, irons, are, on, but, have, not, been, used, in, the, last, minutes
=, This, is, a, great, feature, as, the, straighteners, will, completely, cool, down, and, will, not, reheat, unless, it, is, turned, off, and, then, back, on, again
-, A, swivel, cord, is, another, excellent, feature, that, ensures, freedom, of, movement, when, the, straighteners, are, in, use, without, the, need, to, worry, about, the, cord, becoming, tangled
=, The, Cloud, Nines, also, come, with, a, heat, guard, that, can, be, slipped, on, after, it, has, been, used, so, it, can, be, left, safely, to, fully, cool, down
+, A, handy, pouch, is, also, included, for, storing, the, Cloud, Nine, 's, when, not, in, use
+, The, instruction, booklet, is, an, excellent, source, of, advice, as, it, contains, a, temperature, chart, showing, how, hot, the, irons, should, be, when, creating, a, certain, styles, on, different, hair, types
=, For, eg
-, The, chart, shows, for, creating, curls, on, medium, thick, hair, then, an, ideal, temperature, would, be, degrees, Celsius
+, The, booklet, also, contains, instructions, on, how, to, create, different, styles, using, the, straightener, and, is, explained, in, an, easy, to, understand, way
=, What, do, I, think, about, the, build
+, These, straighteners, have, been, made, to, an, exceptionally, high, standard, and, it, shows, within, the, build
+, They, feel, solid, and, are, so, comfortable, to, hold, and, use
=, The, temperature, settings, and, the, on, off, switch, are, in, a, perfect, position, that, ensures, you, cannot, accidentally, press, it, when, in, use
+, The, plates, are, lovely, and, when, in, use, do, not, pull, or, drag, on, the, hair, at, all
+, The, hair, just, glides, through, the, plates, with, ease, which, makes, styling, so, much, more, of, a, pleasure, than, a, chore
+, The, Cloud, Nines, are, also, rounded, on, the, outside, which, makes, it, so, easy, to, create, curls
+, A, lot, of, thought, has, gone, into, the, design, and, features, and, this, clearly, shows
=, Using, the, Cloud, Nines, For, the, purposes, of, this, review, I, wanted, to, do, something, a, bit, different, than, just, straightening, my, hair, with, the, Cloud, Nines
-, So, I, have, chosen, to, create, beachy, waves, in, my, hair, with, them, instead
=, Prior, to, styling, with, them, I, washed, and, conditioned, my, hair
=, I, then, applied, some, Aussie, Miracle, Hair, Insurance, leave, in, conditioner, to, my, hair, and, blow, dried, it
=, I, then, sectioned, my, hair, and, starting, from, the, bottom, I, began, styling, it
=, Holding, the, straighteners, at, the, root, of, the, hair, I, turned, them, under, degrees, and, held, for, a, second, then, continuing, to, hold, it, I, brought, them, back, to, the, normal, position, and, then, turned, them, up, degrees, and, held, for, a, second, before, sliding, the, straighteners, down, a, couple, of, inches
=, You, then, hold, in, position, again, and, continue, with, the, same, procedure, until, the, whole, section, has, been, done
-, This, creates, a, lovely, beachy, wave, to, the, hair
=, After, completing, the, whole, head
=, I, then, applied, some, Garnier, Fructis, Beach, Hair, Texturising, Gum, love, this, to, separate, the, waves, and, to, add, texture
=, Here, is, the, finished, look, The, Cloud, Nine, 's, were, so, easy, to, use, and, I, did, not, encounter, any, problems, throughout, styling
=, They, heat, up, super, fast, and, are, ready, to, use, within, around, seconds
+, I, am, left, feeling, extremely, impressed, with, these
=, They, are, a, pair, of, high, quality, straighteners, that, give, you, the, opportunity, to, flick, wave, straighten, and, curl, at, lower, temperatures
=, They, also, add, shine, to, the, hair, and, leave, it, feeling, silky, soft, and, smooth
=, I, highly, recommend, these, to, anyone, thinking, of, buying, a, pair, of, high, end, straighteners

+, TITLETITLE, Great, hair, and, skin, start, in, the, shower
+, Last, week, I, reviewed, the, Patene, Pro, V, Strengthening, Mask, and, I, know, a, couple, of, you, who, bought, it, and, loved, it, too, yay
=, For, those, of, you, who, do, not, feel, like, shelling, out, any, cash, but, still, want, great, hair, and, skin, do, not, we, all
+, I, have, got, some, awesome, no, cost, ways, to, look, your, best
=, photo, courtesy, of, Jaci, Berkopec, For, great, hair
=, Do, not, wash, your, hair, every, day
*, I, know, some, people, get, really, freaked, out, by, this, but, let, me, clarify, this, does, not, mean, that, you, cannot, shower, every, day
=, Just, do, not, wash, your, hair, with, shampoo, more, than, times, per, week
-, Washing, more, often, strips, your, hair, of, its, natural, oils, and, leaves, it, looking, dry, and, limp
=, 
=, Wash, your, hair, the, right, way
=, This, means, you, only, use, shampoo, on, your, roots, and, only, use, conditioner, on, your, ends
*, Your, scalp, produces, the, oil, that, you, are, trying, to, wash, out, of, your, hair, but, shampooing, your, ends, will, leave, your, hair, dry, see, above
-, Oppositely, conditioning, all, the, way, to, your, scalp, will, allow, greasy, buildup, to, form, and, will, weigh, your, hair, down
*, Try, this, rule, Shampoo, of, the, way, down, your, hair, condition, of, the, way, up
+, It, works
=, 
=, Seal, in, moisture
=, When, you, are, completely, done, with, your, shower, blast, your, hair, with, the, coldest, water, you, can, stand, for, seconds
=, I, would, recommend, leaning, your, head, under, the, water, I, had, my, body, under, there, the, first, time, and, I, learned, my, lesson
=, Brrrrr
*, Running, cold, water, through, your, hair, tightens, and, seals, the, cuticles, leaving, it, sleeker, and, less, frizzy, as, it, dries
=, 
=, Do, not, rub, your, hair, with, a, towel
=, For, years, my, post, shower, routine, involved, wrapping, my, hair, in, a, towel, turban, getting, dressed, then, rubbing, out, the, excess, moisture
-, Boy, was, I, wrong
*, To, keep, hair, healthy, and, mare, notain, the, shine, you, worked, so, hard, for, in, tip, try, this, instead, Ring, the, water, out, of, your, hair, as, much, as, possible, in, the, shower
=, Use, the, most, absorbent, towel, you, own, for, your, head, and, wrap, it, in, a, turban, while, you, get, dressed, do, your, makeup, eat, breakfast, etc
+, Giving, your, hair, extra, time, to, dry, in, the, towel, will, do, wonders
-, Not, dry, enough, when, you, unwrap
*, Use, the, towel, to, squeeze, the, hair, not, to, rub, it
=, For, great, skin
=, Exfoliate
*, I, have, mentioned, before, how, exfoliating, can, make, skin, look, tighter, and, more, radiant, plus, it, just, feels, so, darn, soft
=, You, can, exfoliate, for, free, at, home, with, a, body, scrub, made, from, ingredients, in, your, kitchen
=, Check, out, how, to, make, it, here
=, 
=, Seal, in, moisture
*, I, have, super, dry, skin, so, I, am, always, looking, for, ways, to, retain, as, much, moisture, as, possible
=, I, learned, this, trick, on, a, radio, show, years, ago, When, you, get, out, of, the, shower, pat, your, skin, dry, with, a, towel, do, not, rub
=, Your, skin, will, automatically, soak, up, some, of, the, steam, and, water, from, the, shower, and, this, way, you, will, not, be, undoing, it
=, Make, sure, to, add, lotion, for, extra, deweyness
=, 
=, Exfoliate, again
=, This, time, on, your, lips
=, I, do, not, care, who, you, are, how, dark, your, lipstick, is, or, whether, or, not, you, have, a, significant, other, to, make, out, with
+, Having, soft, and, pretty, lips, is, a, total, confidence, booster, and, it, is, so, easy, to, do

*, This, is, especially, important, if, you, are, wearing, lipstick, but, like, I, said, smooth, lips, look, great, on, everyone

=, TITLETITLE, Pretty, Waves
+, it, is, really, easy, to, create, the, perfect, look, with, Garnier, Fructis, products
+, I, got, pretty, waves, by, spraying, my, hair, with, water, just, until, it, was, damp
=, Afterward, I, put, Garnier, Fructis, Curl, Crunch, gel, all, throughout, my, hair
=, Then, I, sprayed, it, with, Garnier, Fructis, Curl, shaping, gel
=, I, pulled, my, hair, up, in, a, bun, and, then, put, a, little, more, spray, gel, and, gel, on, it

=, These, are, the, magic, numbers, you, want, to, compare, from, one, RR, promotion, to, another
=, If, they, have, different, manufacturer, codes, then, your, RR, should, print, every, time, even, if, they, are, both, products, technically, from, the, same, company, manufacturer
=, If, the, manufacturer, code, AND, value, amount, is, the, same, then, they, will, never, roll, into, each, other, because, that, means, they, both, will, have, the, exact, same, whole, barcode, unless, that, particular, RR, promotion, is, rolling, into, itself
=, So, since, the, cat, generated, for, buying, a, Dove, shampoo, has, a, different, manufacturer, code, than, the, Dove, shampoo, I, bought, I, thought, it, would, roll, as, long, as, those, numbers, remained, different, I, thought, that, 's, what, the, info, in, the, wiki, was, telling, me

+, Well, only, if, they, knew, what, it, takes, to, achieve, straight, hair, like, this, they, would, not, be, so, quick, to, place, such, a, wish
+, Yes, it, does, look, gorgeous, it, is, not, lifeless, not, dull, and, it, has, bounce
=, However, to, achieve, this, bounce, you, are, hair, has, to, be, thick, to, begin, with
=, so, all, you, other, thin, haired, chicks, yah, may, as, well, stop, reading, now
+, I, will, not, lie, to, you, and, say, these, tips, are, quick, and, easy, because, if, you, have, hair, like, this, you, know, that, NOTHING, is, quick, and, easy
=, First, and, foremost, you, are, going, to, need, a, straight, iron
=, A, chi, works, wonders, but, I, use, a, star, Hollywood, brand, iron, and, I, love, it
=, As, far, as, the, iron, goes, though, you, do, not, want, to, get, a, big, square, shaped, one
=, They, are, far, too, difficult, to, get, to, the, roots, so, go, with, a, nice, thin, straight, iron
=, You, are, going, to, want, to, make, sure, it, has, infrared, technology, though, because, using, infrared, technology, ensures, your, hair, does, not, burn, or, look, dull, over, time
=, So, now, that, you, have, your, straight, iron, and, ladies, make, positive, note, tat, you, DO, NOT, use, any, iron, that, requires, you, to, add, water, this, only, makes, your, locks, frizzier, you, are, now, going, to, need, a, glosser
=, However, if, you, have, greasy, locks, by, nature, you, can, skip, out, on, the, glosser
=, Before, just, working, on, your, hair, with, your, iron, though, you, need, to, shower, first
=, I, recommend, showering, with, moisturizing, shampoo, and, moisturizing, conditioner
+, Pantene, ProV, or, Neutrogena, Moisturizing, products, work, best
=, This, ensures, that, when, you, get, to, using, the, iron, your, hair, will, be, extremely, soft, and, silky, when, complete
=, So, take, your, shower
=, go, on, scrubba, dubba, dub, away, in, the, tub
=, Now, spritz, about, shots, of, the, glosser, into, your, wet, hair
=, If, you, put, the, glosser, in, while, your, hair, is, dry, it, tend, to, give, it, a, fake, greasy, look, so, put, it, in, while, it, is, still, wet
=, Do, not, use, a, lot, though, like, I, said, squirts, is, all, you, will, need
=, My, hair, is, very, very, thick, and, has, always, been, the, max, even, in, my, thick, hair
=, Next, you, will, want, to, towel, dry, your, hair
=, After, towel, drying, you, will, then, need, to, blow, dry, your, hair
=, I, know, that, blow, dryers, are, a, major, no, no, for, those, with, thick, frizzy, hair, but, trust, me, it, makes, straightening, the, hair, go, by, so, much, faster
=, Once, your, hair, is, dry, or, at, least, dry, you, can, now, rev, up, the, straightening, iron
=, I, always, place, the, heat, at, the, highest, maximum, temperature, so, go, ahead, and, do, that, do, not, be, scared, it, will, not, fry, your, hair
=, One, the, iron, has, heated, up, you, are, now, going, to, work, at, straightening, it, out, in, sections
=, Depending, on, how, thick, your, hair, is, and, how, long, it, is, it, will, take, anywhere, from, hour, to, hours, to, have, it, fully, straightened, out
=, You, will, want, to, take, extra, special, care, at, the, roots
=, You, want, to, get, as, close, to, the, scalp, as, possible, without, burning, yourself
=, Although, it, may, take, a, bit, of, time, the, longer, you, work, at, it, the, straighter, it, will, get
=, After, your, hair, is, straightened, out, you, may, want, to, use, a, de, frizzing, serum, I, use, one, by, John, Frieda, that, works, great
